comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The collars of the uniforms have U.S. and various symbols.  I don't think they ALL have identical symbols.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Given that the Bain numbers for several of the Colorado pictures in this batch begin with 3035, I suspect these may be members of the Colorado National Guard or the federal troops sent in by President Wilson.. majorityrights.com/index.php/weblog/comments/the_ludlow_m... shows similar uniforms (in rather small photos). A National History Day video on the Ludlow Massacre www.ratedesi.com/video/v/xp2BK7pKJOI/Ludlow-Massacre show similar uniforms but doesn't really distinguish between the groups of soldiers.
